author: dapplion
content: Can you confirm that your consensus client uses Deneb fork id for exits gossip topics on Deneb? Background: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/issues/3638#issuecomment-2030176740

author: terencechain
content: My prysm node uses `/eth2/6a95a1a9/voluntary_exit/`, which is the same fork digest as other subnets. I think it should be right
